product_name: Mountaineers Books Kissing Kilimanjaro: Leaving It All On Top of Africa
long_description: Ever dream of standing on the highest point in Africa? Follow the adventure as author Daniel Dorr recounts his inspiring experience in Kissing Kilimanjaro: Leaving It All On Top of Africa.
